entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Burk's Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:01 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -4.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 06:55 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -4.6°C
Pressure: 99.8 kPa
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -5.9°C
Wind: E 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending late this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
